text: Trouble in paradise? Hollywood's favorite power couple, Kim Kardashian and Kanye West, are reportedly drafting up a mid - nuptial agreement. Why? Because Kanye's finances are a disaster, and Kimmie wants protection. An insider told Radar Online, ` ` He ’ s making all kinds of deals right now that are very high stakes, and Kim ’ s nervous.'' Although the pair already has an arrangement in place — which protects Kim from going down with him if he screws up — she ` ` wants everything looked over with a fine - tooth comb, especially as her kids are so involved and potentially impacted at this point.'' The insider added, ` ` Kim ’ s worried sick about Kanye ’ s current situation, which has incurred millions in legal fees
